summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganSustainable PackagingGive BackDIME's TBT Clean Retinol Alternative Cream is a retinol alternative that gives you all the benefits of a retinol cream minus the harshness.
details: DetailsBenefitsHelps accelerate skin cell turnoverAssists in plumping and firming the skinImproves the appearance of fine lines and wrinklesHelps to regulate sebum productionEWG VERIFIEDKey IngredientsBakuchiol: A natural alternative to retinol derived from the Psoralea Corylifolia (Babchi) plant. It has been shown to have similar effects as retinol, without irritation. Helps to reduce the appearance of fine lines, wrinkles, and uneven skin tone.Apple Fruit Stem Cell Extract (Malus Domestica Fruit Stem Cell Extract): Signals your own skin stem cells. It also combats the appearance of aging and deep wrinkles. Topical application has been shown to reduce the appearance of crow's feet wrinkles with daily use.Formulated WithoutSulfates: DIME products never contain skin irritating ingredients such as sulfates. Sulfate-free products are gentle on the skin, and can help decrease the chances of an allergic reaction.Parabens: Certain parabens have been linked to hormone disruption. DIME prohibits all parabens, including Ethylparaben, Butylparaben, Isobutylparaben, Isopropylparaben, Methylparaben, and Propylparaben.Fragrance: DIME never uses any form of fragrance, natural or synthetic, in any facial skincare products.Phthalates: Certain phthalates (like Dibutyl Phthalate, aka DBP, or DEHP, and DEP) appear on product labels, but most typically remain unlisted, hiding under the term ‚Äúfragrance.‚Äù Since some phthalates have been linked to hormone disruption, DIME avoids them.Item 2603233How To UseDue to its exfoliation blend and high hydrational and repair properties, it is best to work through the night vs being disrupted by the day's free radicals. DIME recommends either applying after your night cream or alternating between DIME's TBT Cream and your night cream. Both layering and alternating products can be very beneficial for your skin.As a Conscious Beauty brand, DIME features sustainable packaging. Once product is empty, rinse jar and toss into recycling bin.IngredientsWater, Cetyl Ricinoleate, C.C.S Triglyceride, Glycerin, Pentylene Glycol, Isododecane, Polyglyceryl-6 Stearate,Polyglyceryl-6 Behenate,C.C.M.S. Triglyceride,Dimethicone, Apple Extract, Bakuchiol, Olive Unsaponifiables, Orobanche Rapum Extract, Phytosterols, Behenyl Alcohol, C.C. Triglyceride, Glyceryl Stearate, Linoleic Acid, Phospholipids, Stearyl Dimethicone, Octadecene, VP Copolymer, Propanediol, Hydroxyacetophenone, Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Xanthan Gum, 1.2 Hexanediol, Tetrasodium G.D.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Due to its exfoliation blend and high hydrational and repair properties, it is best to work through the night vs being disrupted by the day's free radicals. DIME recommends either applying after your night cream or alternating between DIME's TBT Cream and your night cream. Both layering and alternating products can be very beneficial for your skin.As a Conscious Beauty brand, DIME features sustainable packaging. Once product is empty, rinse jar and toss into recycling bin.

reviews.headline: Not worth it
reviews.comments: I was also excited after reading all the reviews. I started using Dime last year. They say to give it at least 3 months to see results. My skin kept getting worse, but I hoped it'd turn around. After almost a year of using their products my skin is dryer and has more wrinkles. It also made me breakout and I rarely have breakouts. I have dry/sensitive skin. This wasn't for me.

reviews.headline: I would buy it again
reviews.comments: It works well

reviews.headline: Not a fan
reviews.comments: This is causing my face to break out all over. I will not be repurchasing.

reviews.headline: One of my favorites!
reviews.comments: I absolutely love the TBT cream. It leaves my skin feeling so soft and hydrated.

reviews.headline: Good with a caveat
reviews.comments: I had a sample of this and enjoyed it so I was happy to get the full size. It doesn't smell like before. Before I felt like it had no scent and now it has a chemical kind of scent. It's still moisturizing and I enjoy using it so one star off for the scent. But that's clean beauty for you.

reviews.headline: Love this retinol alternative
reviews.comments: Leaves my skin smooth and hydrated. I use it with the TBT Serum. I have just been using Dime since December and I truly love it and see a huge difference in the reduction of fine lines and wrinkles. I have found this to be very effective and no irritation or discomfort.

reviews.headline: Beware of ingredients
reviews.comments: I recently purchased Dime DBT Cream, but I'm quite disappointed with the changes in its ingredients. After comparing the product's box and the website, it's clear that the ingredients listed are significantly different. One notable change is that Bakuchiol, which used to be a key ingredient, is now listed near the bottom of the ingredients list. Meanwhile, VP Copolymer, which was previously much lower, is now near the top. This shift raises concerns about the formulation and effectiveness of the product. I'm a little frustrated that the ingredients have changed without clear communication or transparency. If you're someone who trusted the original formulation, be cautious and do your research before purch

reviews.headline: My go to!
reviews.comments: Was looking for an alternative to retinol during my pregnancy, and found this. I use this with the TBT oil and my skin has been doing so well. My breakouts have cleared, and my skin overall just feels great. Hoping that this will help with spot corrections due to pregnancy. I've tried so many products in the past, and I'm so glad I found this.

reviews.headline: No I would never this product sucks
reviews.comments: This product made my face all fricking acne and never buy it it makes you get rinkles faster if I were you don't ever buy this product in your life!!!!!!!ü§Æü§Æü§Æü§Æü§Æüò°üò°üò°üò°üò°

reviews.headline: New Skincare Staple
reviews.comments: I randomly bought this because I was out of moisturizer and the reviews were so high. This is the best moisturizer I have ever tried. I normally get an eczema breakout from the cold/dry weather but have not since using this. I just bought another but it lasted me a good 4.5 ish months. It's a bit thick but absorbs into the skin very fast and reduces fine lines and helps my makeup look better.

reviews.headline: New Skincare Staple
reviews.comments: I randomly bought this because I was out of moisturizer and the reviews were so high. This is the best moisturizer I have ever tried. I normally get an eczema breakout from the cold/dry weather but have not since using this. I just bought another but it lasted me a good 4.5 ish months. It's a bit thick but absorbs into the skin very fast and reduces fine lines and helps my makeup look better.

reviews.headline: Not for me
reviews.comments: Worked great the first couple times i used it, then every time i would use it after i noticed more break outs.

reviews.headline: Great product!
reviews.comments: You really do have to follow the product directions (Use twice a week to start then ease into use). I have very sensitive combo skin so I have to be careful (I break out in a rash). Well, after using this product for over a month now, I can feel the difference in my skin. It's smoother and I feel like I'm not as oily prior to use. I only use it at night. The product itself is not greasy and a lot goes a long way. I have put this in my daily skin care regimen.

reviews.headline: Soft hydrated skin when you wake!
reviews.comments: Love it and have had no reactions from it, which is saying domething.

reviews.headline: Terribly disappointed
reviews.comments: I was incredibly excited to try this given the amazing reviews. However, this didnt absorb in my skin and rolled/peeled off. After about 3 months, the entire container congealed together and is a solid clump in the container. Terribly disappointed for the price of the product. It was a complete waste.

reviews.headline: 66 y.o. Mom loves this stuff
reviews.comments: I got a sample of this cream - it was in a glass jar, figured it was too good to just throw out so I decided to offer it to my mom first. Pretty much all skin care (except my korean spf) makes me break out. Anyway, a few days later my mom was raving about how incredibly well this moisturizer plumps her skin and fills her wrinkles. I researched this TBT cream online it found out that its a retinol alternative, which is awesome! My mom is a sun worshipper and these past two summers have left with her fine lines all over her face. She cant use traditional retinols because she has rosacea and very sensitive skin. Just bought her a full dozed jar, Mom approves it and recommends it.

reviews.headline: NOTICEABLE DIFFERENCE
reviews.comments:
Ive used clinique for years due to my sensitive skin. I am 33 years old and was looking for something new. My skin was looking dull. 

After only 4 days of using this product in the AM and PM, my skin has had a noticeable glow and plumpness to it. 

I can not rave enough! 10/10!

reviews.headline: It worked for me
reviews.comments:
I love this stuff. I'm nit a big product junkie. I'm getting older and ciuld never really find affordable products to help my combination, sensitive skin.
This stuff is great. Idk what made me try it, but I'm so happy i did. I always get compliments when i remember to put it on.

reviews.headline: A new must have!!!
reviews.comments: I love how nourishing it feels.I have very sensitive skin and it has been working great.There's a tiny bit of a smell but not enough to bother me or keep me from buying it again, which I will be doing.

reviews.headline: Super moisturizing
reviews.comments: I've only used it three times so far, but it's extremely moisturizing. I have very sensitive skin so I've given it three days between uses. I usually put it on right before bed but tonight I had a couple hours and touched my face and this stuff pills like crazy. That's my only complaint, though

faceoff_positive.comments: I've been looking for a new moisturizer because the one I've been using for months just didn't seem to be doing its job anymore, and I saw positive reviews for this one. jI didn't realize this was a "night cream" when I bought it until I read the fine print on the packaging, but it's part of my daily/nightly skincare routine and my skin LOVES it! It actually moisturizes, and it's just been a week but I've noticed how plumped up and soft and youthful my skin looks. It's so much healthier! A little goes a long way, and you can always pop on a smidge more if needed but it's hydrating.
faceoff_positive.headline: Skin looks younger and healthier!
